metadata.description:
A four-issue limited series.

Four teenage friends are about to be reunited. Over the years they lost contact, as their lives took different directions, but the appearance of a politician, running for one of the highest positions in government, has brought them back together... They know him, and they are the only ones who know about the atrocities he committed nearly thirty years ago...

Back then, they formed a secret superhero group called the "Vigilantes" to stop him. The time has now come to revive it!
metadata.name: Vigilantes
